[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” particles=”1″ particles_color=”#ffe27a” css=”.vc_custom_1564133282890{padding-bottom: 110px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1615568872506{padding-right: 80px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-6″ custom_styles_portrait=”.vc_custom_1615568872510{padding-right: 15px !important;}”]

Who We Are

‘Team Bohar’ is a group of friends who are embarking on their next venture to provide a platform that will enable businesses to provision their business software in an express mode, with a strong focus on technology. We believe that without a deep passion, creativity, and hard work, the knowledge and the experience are insignificant.

Technology is transforming the ways we live, work, and interact with one another and the rest of the world. We are well-versed in the ways in which technology is influencing our future. Technology is being used in almost every sector on every day in this digital era and we are very much glad to be a part of it, as well as to have the strength to shape it.

As digital pioneers and creative professionals, we are delighted to assist businesses and individuals in our community with the innovative ideas and solutions. Our objective is to provide all of our customers with an innovative and perfect business platform so that they can obtain the best out of their business. Our people are our greatest asset. We’ve made certain that each of us has a perfect work-life balance and that we enjoy what we do here.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-6″ custom_styles_mobile=”.vc_custom_1615568864369{margin-top: 50px !important;}”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1562853410743{background: #1f5abc url(http://localhost:8080/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/bg_02-1.jpg?id=435) !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″]
Vision
Every Business, No Matter What Industry They Are In, Must Become Digital.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ custom_styles_mobile=”.vc_custom_1565252939462{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-top-color: #4586f4 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}”]
Mission
Building The Software Products With Imagination, Innovation, And Ingenuity
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1564638009093{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1565253905831{padding-right: 100px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-5″ custom_styles_portrait=”.vc_custom_1565253905834{padding-right: 15px !important;}” custom_styles_landscape=”.vc_custom_1565253905833{padding-right: 40px !important;}”]

How We Work

Organizational Management
We are very convenient to work with our clients by genuinely listening to their needs, and focusing our efforts on the big picture, and quite frankly.
Focus Energy and Resources
We are dedicated to provide our clients with innovative solutions that meet all of their requirements and their standards.
Developing Critical Elements
Rather than concentrating on our profits, we prioritize our clients' satisfaction in order to ensure a healthy client-relationship.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-7″ custom_styles_mobile=”.vc_custom_1565253885988{margin-top: 30px !important;}”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” add_waves=”1″ wave_bottom_left=”1″ wave_bottom_right=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1615570856774{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #d2eaff !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1565255091709{margin-top: 25px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Consistency
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Accountability and boldness
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Timely Delivery
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Flexible payment options
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Regular status updates
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Clear Communication
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Trustworthy data protection
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Trendy and innovative
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
Teamwork and result oriented
